summary: This is an email chain from April 26, 2019, between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel discussing coordination for an upcoming meeting with Brad Weinshiemer regarding the Epstein case. The emails focus on scheduling, confirming details, and preparing an update memo on the investigation's status and next steps.

persons.name: Brad Weinshiemer
persons.role: Person to be met with by US Attorney's Office
persons.context: Mentioned as the person with whom someone from the US Attorney's Office is scheduled to meet on Monday regarding the Epstein case.

events.title: Scheduled meeting with Brad Weinshiemer
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for Monday between a representative of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York and Brad Weinshiemer to discuss the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) was actively working on the Epstein case as of late April 2019.
A meeting was scheduled for the following Monday (April 29, 2019) with an individual named Brad Weinshiemer.
The office was tasked with preparing an internal update memo detailing the investigation's progress, actions taken since the last update, and planned next steps.
The email chain shows internal coordination and confirmation of details among USANYS staff regarding this meeting and memo preparation.
